about_the_game:
RPG that walks with romantic comedy

■What is "Murasame"?

There are laughter, tears, and a little sadness.

Here comes the slapstick fantasy love-comedy RPG!

■Charming heartwarming romantic comedy story

The dichotomy between gag and serious!

The curtain rises on a romantic comedy that mixes in perfect balance and is sure to make your heart pound!

■Heroines with too much individuality

All the heroines are troublesome!

The story accelerates in an oblique direction due to the outbursts of the super troublesome heroines with too many quirks!

■Casual and easy-to-play game system

The scenario is divided into fast-paced episodes and

The intermission between each episode strengthens the character and progresses the quest!

For users who are not good at fighting, there is a "cheat mode" that starts at the strongest Level max!

■Additional elements for the Switch version included

EX scenario "Seiou no Butokukai Hen" added after clearing the main story

New characters "Brünnhilde, Sword Princess of the White Silver Sword" and "Glenn, Deputy Commander of the Order of the Holy Emperor

■Synopsis

Excalibur, the sword-and-dragon dragon, suddenly appeared in the Highland Holy Empire.

Before the overwhelming power of the Sword Demon Dragon and its absolute defensive barrier that nullifies all attacks

The Knights of the Holy Order of the Highlanders were helplessly defeated, and a city was destroyed.

Yuto, who lost his own sister, Yurihime, to the disaster.

A girl with the only sword that can kill the avenging Sword Demon Dragon, "Sword Breaker".

Satsuki, a young woman with a strong sense of humor.
